column2: "<%me>. You came. Welcome to the battle lobby."
"In this lobby, you can participate in a VR Training Competition Battle Arena."

"What is the Battle Arena?
Those who wish to test their skills, compete against others in a ranked battle."
"From this counter, you can enter a match. A countdown will start after a number of people participate in the same match."
"After each match, you can receive Battle Coins, which you can trade for various items."
"Also in this block, you will be changed into the class Battle Warrior."
"Don't worry however, you will be changed back into your original class once you've returned to the normal lobbies."
"If you have any questions, feel free to ask me if you're still confused. I look forward to your success."
